items.name: API's
items.title: Enhancements
items.body:
Two enhancements have been made to the Update Subscription API call:

  • The client order id has been added as a field that can be returned and populated based on information in the call.
  • The Renewal Count has also been added as a field that can bereturned.

items.name: Customer View
items.title: Demo Date and Batch Tracking ID
items.body: In our last release, we added the option to key the demo date and batch tracking id on each individual demographic when entering an order. With this code release, you are now able to add/update this information in the demographic section of Customer View. Please contact your Account Manager with any questions.

items.name: Omail
items.title: Upgraded version of WYSIWYG editor
items.body:
Our WYSIWYG editor has now been upgraded to the most recent version of CKEditor - CKEditor 4.5.7 (revision e98277f).
New features include an updated interface and the addition of the Styles drop-down which allows you to easily apply customized styles and semantic values to content created in the editor.
The user guide can be found here CKEditor User Guide.

items.name: Reports
items.title: Omail - Summary by Link Category
items.body: The Summary by Link Category report has now been enhanced to allow you to run it over user specified date ranges. Previously you could only select an entire month period. This report is an excellent way to view the success of your categorized links. Please contact the Omail team to review this functionality.
